TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CompositeDataBoundControl extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl implements class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer
Public MustInherit Class CompositeDataBoundControl Inherits DataBoundControl Implements INamingContainer
public ref class CompositeDataBoundControl abstract : System::Web::UI::WebControls::DataBoundControl, System::Web::UI::INamingContainer

summary.span: 表示表格式資料繫結程序控制項的基底類別，該控制項是由其他伺服器控制項所組成。

span.span: Represents the base class for a tabular data-bound control that is composed of other server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可做為資料來源的繫結至資料的複合伺服器控制項的基底類別。The class serves as the base class for a composite server control that binds to data from a data source. 複合伺服器控制項是從其他伺服器控制項的組合所建置的控制項。A composite server control is a control that is built from a combination of other server controls. 不使用網頁開發人員類別直接; 相反地，他們會使用衍生自這個類別的控制項。Page developers do not use the class directly; instead, they use controls that derive from this class. 複合資料繫結控制項的範例包括， ，和控制項。Examples of composite data-bound controls include the , , and controls. 類別繼承自控制項必須覆寫方法來建立在控制項階層架構。Classes that inherit from the control must override the method to create the control hierarchy. 若要存取複合資料繫結控制項的子控制項，請使用集合。To access the child controls of a composite data-bound control, use the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立自訂複合資料繫結控制項顯示資料表中的資料來源的值。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom composite data-bound control that displays the values of a data source in a table. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1/CS/idataitemcontainersample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1/VB/idataitemcontainersample.vb#2)]

para.span: 當您繼承自類別，您必須覆寫下列成員： 。

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是抽象類別。The class is an abstract class. 您無法建立這個類別的新執行個體。You cannot create a new instance of this class.

summary.span: 取得複合資料繫結控制項內之子控制項的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the child controls within the composite data-bound control.

value.span: ，表示複合資料繫結控制項內的子控制項。

span.span: A that represents the child controls within the composite data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 複合資料繫結控制項是一個或多個伺服器控制項的組合。A composite data-bound control is a combination of one or more server controls. 使用來管理這些子控制項的屬性。Use the property to manage these child controls. 您可以新增、 移除或逐一查看集合中的伺服器控制項。You can add, remove, or iterate through the server controls in the collection.

summary.span: 建立用來呈現複合資料繫結控制項的控制項階層架構。

span.span: Creates the control hierarchy that is used to render a composite data-bound control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void CreateChildControls ();
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void CreateChildControls() cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub CreateChildControls ()
protected public: override void CreateChildControls();

summary.span: 根據儲存在檢視狀態中的值，建立用來呈現複合資料繫結控制項的控制項階層架構。

span.span: Creates the control hierarchy that is used to render a composite data-bound control based on the values that are stored in view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，可由衍生自的類別以建立複合的資料繫結控制項的控制項階層架構。The method is a helper method that is used by classes that derive from the class to create the control hierarchy for a composite data-bound control. 這個方法多載，建立根據從檢視狀態，而不是直接從資料來源的值在控制項階層架構。This overload of the method creates the control hierarchy based on values from view state, rather than directly from the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract int CreateChildControls (System.Collections.IEnumerable dataSource, bool dataBinding);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 CreateChildControls(class System.Collections.IEnumerable dataSource, bool dataBinding) cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function CreateChildControls (dataSource As IEnumerable, dataBinding As Boolean) As Integer
protected: abstract int CreateChildControls(System::Collections::IEnumerable ^ dataSource, bool dataBinding);

summary.span: 在抽象類別中被覆寫時，根據指定之資料來源中的值，建立用來呈現複合資料繫結控制項的控制項階層架構。

span.span: When overridden in an abstract class, creates the control hierarchy that is used to render the composite data-bound control based on the values from the specified data source.

returns.span: 由 所建立之項目的數目。

span.span: The number of items created by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，可由衍生自的類別以建立複合的資料繫結控制項的控制項階層架構。The method is a helper method that is used by classes that derive from the class to create the control hierarchy for a composite data-bound control. 在擴充類別，您必須覆寫控制項階層架構中，建立自己的方法。When extending the class, you must override the method to create your own control hierarchy. 如需有關建立複合控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱[開發自訂 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef)。For more information on creating a composite control, see [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫自訂控制項，以建立在控制項階層架構中的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom control to create the control hierarchy. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1/CS/idataitemcontainersample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1/VB/idataitemcontainersample.vb#2)]

summary.span: 為了刪除資料，取得或設定要呼叫的方法名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the method to call in order to delete data.
The name of the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性會導致模型繫結來做為資料繫結方法。Setting this property causes model binding to be used as the data-binding method. 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性會導致模型繫結來做為資料繫結方法。Setting this property causes model binding to be used as the data-binding method. 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).

span.span: Binds the data from the data source to the composite data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，可由衍生自的從資料來源將資料繫結至複合資料繫結控制項的類別。The method is a helper method that is used by classes that derive from the class to bind the data from the data source to the composite data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性會導致模型繫結來做為資料繫結方法。Setting this property causes model binding to be used as the data-binding method. 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
